name: GeoSpark Analytics, Inc
desc: Geospark Analytics provides an risk assessment platform and political stability indices (via platform, API and CSV), which includes an AI-driven calculation of political/societal stability scores for every country, 1,200 cities and 7,000 regions covering the entire globe updated hourly. These assessments enable global investors to incorporate real-time micro-stability assessments into investment/divestment strategies and insurance/re-insurance risk.
full_sector_coverage: Political Risk, Insurance Risk, Hedge Fund Risk, Threat Risk, Logistic Risk
sectors: Agriculture, China, Financial Services, Insurance, Transportation, Travel
pricing_structure: The models are priced by access via API subscription, a period tabular data transfer or by subscription to Geospark Analytics' Hyperion platform.
secondary_data_sources: Web Data, Geo-location, Public Data, Social/Sentiment, Weather
advantages: Geospark Analytics provides the only 100% AI-driven geopolitical risk assessment index. No other risk index is calculated as accurately, as frequent and at the same fidelity.
use_cases: As a factor of stability in calculation of insurance risk, commodity trading, logistics planning, travel risk and security risk.
